snippet: The House Ethics Committee is investigating allegations that Representative Mike Honda of California, may have improperly used his office staff to help his re-election efforts over the last four years.
abstract: House Ethics Committee releases preliminary report on accusations that Rep Mike Honda, Democrat of California, used his government office staff to aid re-election efforts over four-year period.
lead_paragraph: The House Ethics Committee is investigating allegations that Representative Mike Honda of California, may have improperly used his office staff to help his re-election efforts over the last four years.

headline.main: California Lawmaker Is Focus of House Ethics Panel Inquiry
headline.print_headline: California Lawmaker Is Focus of House Ethics Panel Inquiry
